title: How can one become proficient in English- speaking and writing from being a basic English speaker and writer? - Quora

response.answer_text: WRITING To improve your English writing read newspapers, articles. Try to adopt their way of writing.Make sure you have a good handwritingImprove your grammarFollow punctuationAvoid strikingsProper sentence formation. Using effective interjects and also effective language.I am sure by following these you will be great at writing SPEAKING To improve your speaking skills, watch English news, films, songsTry your level best to communicate with your friends in English.Be confident in what you say.Avoid stage fear.

If anyone knows basic English Speaking & Writing then it’ll be very easy for him/her to enhance his/her proficiency in English, he/she just need to start reading and continue the practice to become expert speaker & writer…
